data.name: Section 8: Prejudice Blitz Pack
data.detailed_description: Power up your weapons and suit with the Blitz Pack.  Includes the Napalm Mortar, Incendiary Rounds for the Shotgun, and Blitz Armor.  Napalm Mortars set the earth ablaze with flammable shells to burn down your enemies long after impact.  Incendiary Rounds for the Shotgun incinerate on impact, damaging enemy armor over time.  Blitz Armor is available for both Section 8 and Arm of Orion forces and displays the emblems of the most bold and fearless soldiers.

data.detailed_description: The Overdrive Map Pack comes with two new multiplayer maps, Abaddon and Sky Dock. Amidst the magma craters of Abaddon, protect a power cell facility built on a scalding energy source. Sky Dock is a crucial military base and space port nestled in the frozen tundra. Each map is playable in both multiplayer and offline play for all game modes.

data.name: Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns
data.detailed_description:
Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns is the first game in the ground-breaking, award-winning real time strategy series. Awarded “RTS Game of the Year” by PC Gamer and Computer Games Magazine, Immortal Sovereigns is a real-time strategy game set in a fantasy world where you take on the role of an immortal known as the Kohan. Your race once ruled the world but was devastated in a series of massive cataclysms. As an immortal, you have reawakened to a new world unlike the one you once knew. Now you must come to grips with your past glory, your present hardship, and your future destiny. If you are to return your race to their rightful glory, you must solve the mystery of their destruction.

Key features:

  • Full length single-player campaign.
  • Multiplayer supports up to 8 players who can choose to play as one of four factions, all struggling for supremacy in a war-torn world.
  • Over 40 unique units.
  • Wage war in multiple environments that include lush forest, rolling hills, and barren desert.
  • Scores of magical spells ranging from protective blessing to devastating fireballs.
  • Fully functional editor with random map generator that allows players to custom make their own campaigns, single scenarios, and even death match maps.

data.name: Kohan: Ahriman's Gift
data.detailed_description:
Kohan: Ahriman’s Gift, awarded “Strategy Game of the Year” by Computer Gaming World, is a real-time strategy game set in the fantasy world of Khaldun. Built on the award-winning Kohan:Immortal Sovereigns gameplay, Ahriman’s Gift is the stand-alone prequel to Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns. Experience the world of Khaldun from a whole new perspective: evil. Lead armies of Shadowbeasts and Undead as you ravage the countryside, driving all enemies before you. Ahriman’s Gift not only provides new campaigns and improved artificial intelligence, but also introduces dozens of new heroes and units to control.

Key features:

  • Two new political factions and two new independent races.
  • A single player campaign mission
  • 5 campaigns to explore and conquer and an additional 40 custom designed maps, including several official Tournament maps.
  • Robust multiplayer support for up to 8 players.
  • Random map generator and map editors to custom make your own Deathmatch, Scenario, and Campaign maps.
  • Over 90 beautifully detailed units and over 70 different heroes.
  • Over 100 spells and over 75 technologies that will enhance your strategy.
  • 30 different AI players challenge you with various styles of play.
  • Seven different game types (including Bloodbath and King of the Hill).

data.name: Kohan II: Kings of War
data.detailed_description:
Awarded “Top 10 Game of 2004” by Computer Games Magazine, Kohan II: Kings of War returns players to the dangerous beauty of Khaldun, where the brief respite in the timeless war between Light and Shadow has come to its end. Even as the world erupts in civil war, an ancient evil gives out a call, and the Shadow-touched begin to gather.

Set years after Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns, Kohan II: Kings of War raises the Kohan series to new heights, introducing gorgeous 3D rendered terrain, weather effects, diverse armies, and more, while still retaining the award-winning gameplay of the original games.

Key features:

  • Battle online with up to 8 rival generals in a variety of multiplayer scenarios.
  • Random map generator and map editors to customize your own maps.
  • Single-player campaign mission.
  • 25 campaign missions.
  • Six distinct warring races and five rival political factions.
  • Streamline Unit Management: Kohan’s revolutionary unit command system keeps your focus on combat and conquest.
  • Handpick your Heroes and Warriors and build up their skills and spells.
  • Discover new technologies that will provide you with hidden powers and units.
  • Awaken over 70 different Kohan heroes and keep them alive to unlock their devastating spells.

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Apex Predators”
data.detailed_description:
Garruk Wildspeaker’s fully unlocked “Apex Predators” green deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Since his spark ignited, evolving him into a Planeswalker, Garruk Wildspeaker has traveled the planes in search of the deadliest prey he can find. Inevitably, he crossed path with fellow Planeswalkers, and Garruk knew the hunt was on. Garruk’s deck is packed with new cards, but his game plan hasn’t changed: cast the largest creatures around, and pump them up to gargantuan dominance.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Wielding Steel”
data.detailed_description:
Gideon Jura’s fully unlocked “Wielding Steel” white deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Strong. Heroic. Gallant. Gideon is accurately portrayed as all these things, but to him they are just words. Only his actions carry meaning, and his strong morals and sense of duty lead him to take action frequently in defense of justice. His deck emphasizes the strength of a coordinated, well-equipped army. With brave Soldiers and majestic Angels working in tandem, the unruly forces of chaos won’t stand a chance.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

His talents for deception and illusion grow with each plane he visits. As always, he stands on a moral precipice—torn between the good he could accomplish and the power rising within him. His latest creation is stocked with powerful Illusions that will have your opponent believing in no time. Your card-drawing spells ensure you’re never out of tricks.

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Strength of Stone”
data.detailed_description:
Koth’s fully unlocked “Strength of Stone” red deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Koth is a vulshok from the Hammer Tribe on Mirrodin, a red-aligned Planeswalker with the ability to move mountains and melt iron. Like Koth himself, the creatures he summons draw power from the surrounding mountains. This deck’s has fearsome offensive capabilities; often the amount of damage you can deal is limited only by the mana you have available. Your opponents will be battered, bruised, and most importantly, defeated.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.detailed_description:
Nissa Revane’s fully unlocked “Guardians of the Wood” green-black deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Nissa Revane believes in one thing: the strength of her people. She commands an impressive army of elves: warriors and fighters, clerics and mages, all willing to fight and die for her and her goals of elvish dominance. If swarming your enemy doesn’t quite get the job done, eliminate the strongest opposition with pinpoint removal spells and claim victory!

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Ancient Depths”
data.detailed_description:
Kiora Atua’s fully unlocked “Ancient Depths” blue-green deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Kiora Atua is a newly-discovered Merfolk planeswalker with a fierce mastery of aquatic forces. Able to command the powerful oceans and the creatures that dwell there, her calm demeanor belies a fury borne of the darkest depths. Her deck is all about massive, game-ending monstrosities and getting them onto the battlefield very quickly. Take advantage of land and sea to build your power quickly and unleash a wave of aggression!

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Dragon’s Roar”
data.detailed_description:
Sarkhan Vol’s fully unlocked “Dragon’s Roar” red-black deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Sarkhan Vol’s specialty is draconic shamanism: spells that summon dragons and evoke the rage and passion of dragonkind. Start the onslaught with goblin underlings on the first turn and don’t let up until mighty dragons engulf the skies overhead. And if any dare stand against you, you’ll have a host of red and black removal spells to ensure they don’t stand for very long.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Blood Hunger”
data.detailed_description:
Sorin Markov’s fully unlocked “Blood Hunger” black deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Sorin Markov is older than most other Planeswalkers you’ve encountered. His multiple millennia have brought him an easy confidence and a host of loyal followers. This deck is packed with deadly vampires ready to feast on the opposition. Of course, you may need to snack on your own every once in a while too. Only the strongest will survive. Let the blood hunt begin!

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck “Machinations”
data.detailed_description:
Tezzeret’s fully unlocked “Machinations” blue-black-white deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Tezzeret is a master of artifice, able to forge and manipulate artifacts. A native of the Esper shard of Alara, his body is infused with the magical alloy etherium. His skill in using artifacts to great advantage can be seen in this deck. Smaller artifacts can be grown or reshaped into larger threats. Your countermagic allows you to and maintain control of the battlefield and assure victory!

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck "Unquenchable Fire"
data.detailed_description:
Chandra Nalaar’s fully unlocked “Unquenchable Fire” red deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Chandra Nalaar is a passionate Planeswalker who rejects authority and control. Her specialty is pyromancy—she’d rather set things on fire now and ask questions later. Chandra’s arsenal is fueled by fire and a desire to see her punishing damage spells burn away any opposition. With nothing left on the scorched battlefield to get in the way, the deck’s efficient creatures can attack unimpeded to guarantee your victory.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)

data.name: Magic 2012 Full Deck "Grave Whispers"
data.detailed_description:
Liliana Vess’s fully unlocked “Grave Whispers” black deck for Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012. Long ago, Liliana made a deal to guarantee long-lasting life and beauty. Now, she specializes in necromancy: spells that reanimate the dead and unlock power from death. Harness that power by mastering a horde of zombies, skeletons, and other ghoulish creations. Cripple your opponent with discard spells, then bring their best creatures back from the dead to fight for you.

(Contains no new content. This content is also available through game play.)
